An '''error''' is a piece of text that appears on the screen to alert the player of some form of mistake or complications.

== Chat errors ==
These errors appear in the chat,{{only|Bedrock|short=1}} or [[action bar]].{{only|Java|short=1}}
{| class="wikitable"
!Name
!Meaning
!Editions
|-
|Unable to open. Loot not generated yet.
|The player cannot open a chest that has not been opened yet in spectator mode. 
|{{JE}} only
|-
|You may not rest now, there are monsters nearby
|There are [[monster]]s near the bed, which prevents sleeping.
|Both
|-
|Bed is too far away
|You are too far away from the bed to go to bed.
|Both
|-
|You can only sleep at night and during thunderstorms
|The player cannot sleep during the day, unless there is a thunderstorm.
|Both
|-
|This bed is occupied
|The player can't sleep, as there is another player in this bed already. 
|Both
|-
|No amount of rest can pass this night
|The {{gmr|players_sleeping_percentage}} is set higher than 100, which prevents sleeping from passing the night.
|Both
|-
|You have no home bed or charged Respawn Anchor, or it was obstructed
|When a bed is destroyed, blocked {{Only|Java|short=1}} or placed in the Nether or End.
|Both
|-
|Height limit for building is (128,256,320) blocks
|When {{control|placing}} on a block above the height limit.
|Both
|-
|Minimum height limit for building is -64 blocks
|When {{control|placing}} on a block below the height limit.
|{{BE}} only
|}

== Errors in Legacy Console Edition ==
There are errors that appear in the middle of the screen, similar to [[death messages]]. 
{| class="wikitable"
!Name
!Meaning
|-
|You may not rest now, there are monsters nearby
|There are some monsters too close to the bed.
|-
|You can only sleep at night
|Players cannot sleep during the day.
|-
|You can't summon enemies in peaceful mode.
|Players cannot summon hostile mobs in peaceful mode.
|-
|This animal can't enter love mode.
|The maximum animals that can breed has been reached (except for: mooshrooms, chickens, and wolves).
|-
|You may not rest now; the bed is too far away
|The player is not close enough to the bed.
|}

=== Error hints ===
These errors appear in boxes similar to the hints found in the tutorial.
{| class="wikitable"
!Name
!Meaning
|-
|You cannot do this action until you have completed the tutorial.
|The player needs to complete the tutorial in order to get access to the other areas in the tutorial.
|-
|You do not have all the ingredients to make this item.
|The player needs more materials to make this item.
|}

== Special errors ==
These errors are only found in the menus that indicate the errors, and not while playing the game in a [[world]].
{| class="wikitable"
|+
!Name
!Meaning
!Editions
|-

We have encountred a unknown error. Please try again.
|This error occurs because you may have a poor network.
|{{BE}} only
|-
|You don't have a Realms Plus subscription.
|Those who have a Realms Plus subscription that has no Microsoft account, or they do not have the subscription.
|{{BE}} only
|-
|There was a problem, and multi-player hosting has stopped.
|This error occurs when there is no connection. Applies in multiplayer only.
|{{BE}} only
|-
|There was a problem loading this world.
|Worlds from newer versions can't generate in older versions. It also may occur if the world is corrupted.

|}
